us.derfers.tribex.rapids.GUI.Swing

Class Widgets

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.derfers.tribex.rapids.GUI.Swing.Widgets

  • public class Widgets
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for creating widgets inside composites. Might be better written as seperate classes that extend their respective widgets
    Author:
    TribeX
